_sText:
ZM_ECHO_CRISIS_B1
========================
Last Updated: November 5, 2007
Total Spawn Points: 80+
Recommended Players: 24 - 64
========================

MAP FEATURES:

- Fast-paced gameplay.
- Original trolley feature.
- Ambient alarm system.
- "Earthquake"-shaking feature.
- 20+ camping, barricading, and hidden areas.
- Plenty of room for 64 players.
- The map file is only 2MB.
- BZIP2-compressed FastDL/FastHTTP file included.
- "Readme" file included in your download.
- AND MUCH MORE!

========================

VIDEO:

<embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://vid211.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid211.photobucket.com/albums/bb195/Grey-Echo/zmeicb1.flv"></embed>

THIS VIDEO DISPLAYS AN OLD VERSION OF THE MAP...
Please download and test for the full experience.

Not all features of the map are shown in the video. Please download the map yourself if you like the video to see everything. There's one secret in the map, and I dare you to try and find it. ^.^

========================

PLEASE NOTE:

This map will be my last map I'll ever make. While I plan to improve zm_openseas_b1 and probably this map as well, I will not be executing anymore new ideas. I will continue to provide advise and review other ZM maps however and help those who need it. Thanks for everyone's understanding and support. It's been fun. =)
